message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to own this valuable asset. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1300000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1000000. I'm willing to pay that price for it.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $1250000.
I'm still interested in the product, but I think $1250000 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'll counter with $1100000. Can you consider that?

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm still not willing to go as low as $1100000. I'm willing to compromise and offer it to you for $1180000. This is the best I can do, considering the value of the product.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but $1180000 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'll make one more counteroffer, and I'm willing to go up to $1150000. That's the highest I'm willing to go, so I hope we can meet in the middle this time.

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to go up to $1150000. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product for that price. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer it to you for $1160000. This is the best I can do, considering the value of the product.

I'm starting to feel like we're getting close, Alice. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer, but I need to be careful with my budget. I'll meet you at $1170000, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. Can you meet me there?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $1170000, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product for that price. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer it to you for $1190000. This is the best I can do, considering the value of the product.

I've reached my limit, Alice. I'm willing to go up to $1200000, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'm afraid I'll have to consider buying the product from John for $1500000. I'm willing to make one final offer of $1200000, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
